languages.text: "Что ж, раз все финансовые вопросы решены, позвольте откланяться. Предстоит длительный учет полученных ценностей". {n}Высокий Фактотум учтиво кивает вам и косится на проктора, который не спешит покидать мостик.{/n}

"Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что ж, раз все финансовые вопросы решены, позвольте откланяться. Предстоит длительный учет полученных ценностей". {n}Высокий Фактотум учтиво кивает вам и косится на проктора, который не спешит покидать мостик.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Well, now that all financial matters have been resolved, graciously allow me to depart. All the valuables must be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

"Well, now that all financial matters have been resolved, graciously allow me to depart. All the valuables must be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

"Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

"Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

"Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

"Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

languages.text: «Bueno, ahora que todos los asuntos financieros están resueltos, me retiraré, con su venia. Debemos catalogar todos los bienes con exactitud». {n}El Factótum te dedica una profunda reverencia mientras mira de reojo a Solomorne, que no aparenta tener prisa por marcharse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ahora que todos los asuntos financieros están resueltos, me retiraré, con su venia. Debemos catalogar todos los bienes con exactitud». {n}El Factótum te dedica una profunda reverencia mientras mira de reojo a Solomorne, que no aparenta tener prisa por marcharse.{/n}

languages.text: “既然所有的财务问题都已经解决了，请允许我告辞。船上的贵重物品必须仔细清点一番。”{n}高阶顾问向你深鞠一躬，瞟了一眼索罗蒙。看起来，索罗蒙并不急于离开。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然所有的财务问题都已经解决了，请允许我告辞。船上的贵重物品必须仔细清点一番。”{n}高阶顾问向你深鞠一躬，瞟了一眼索罗蒙。看起来，索罗蒙并不急于离开。{/n}

languages.text: « Bien, maintenant que les questions financières sont réglées, permettez que je prenne congé. Il me faut à présent dresser l'inventaire complet de notre butin. » {n}Le factotum vous gratifie d'une profonde révérence, tout en lançant une œillade discrète en direction de Solomorne, qui n'a pas l'air pressé de partir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien, maintenant que les questions financières sont réglées, permettez que je prenne congé. Il me faut à présent dresser l'inventaire complet de notre butin. » {n}Le factotum vous gratifie d'une profonde révérence, tout en lançant une œillade discrète en direction de Solomorne, qui n'a pas l'air pressé de partir.{/n}

languages.text: 「さて、すべての財政問題が解決されている今、私の退出を寛大にお許しください。価値あるものはすべて、細かく在庫を調べなくてはなりません」{n}ファクトタムはあなたに深々とお辞儀をし、急いで去る必要がないように見えるソロモーンを横目で見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「さて、すべての財政問題が解決されている今、私の退出を寛大にお許しください。価値あるものはすべて、細かく在庫を調べなくてはなりません」{n}ファクトタムはあなたに深々とお辞儀をし、急いで去る必要がないように見えるソロモーンを横目で見る。{/n}

languages.text: "Maddi meseleleri hallettiğimize göre müsaadenizle ben artık gideyim. Değerli malların envanteri çıkarılacak, titiz olmamız da şart." {n}Kâhya, yerlere kadar eğilip ortamdan ayrılmak için acelesi yokmuş gibi duran Solomorne'a yan gözle bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Maddi meseleleri hallettiğimize göre müsaadenizle ben artık gideyim. Değerli malların envanteri çıkarılacak, titiz olmamız da şart." {n}Kâhya, yerlere kadar eğilip ortamdan ayrılmak için acelesi yokmuş gibi duran Solomorne'a yan gözle bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Tja, nachdem alle finanziellen Fragen geklärt sind, würde ich mich jetzt gerne zurückziehen. Unsere Funde müssen akribisch inventarisiert werden." {n}Das Faktotum verneigt sich tief und wirft Solomorne einen Seitenblick zu, der es allerdings nicht eilig zu haben scheint, aufzubrechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Well, now that all the financial matters have been resolved, allow me graciously to take my leave. The valuables must all be meticulously inventoried." {n}The Factotum offers you a deep bow, glancing sideways at Solomorne, who seems to be in no hurry to leave.{/n}

Unsere Funde müssen akribisch inventarisiert werden." {n}Das Faktotum verneigt sich tief und wirft Solomorne einen Seitenblick zu, der es allerdings nicht eilig zu haben scheint, aufzubrechen.{/n}
